Transactor Things¶

Contexts and other classes used in transaction processing.

class xrpl_plugin.transactors.Application¶

Bases: pybind11_object

The ledger and transaction processor.

class xrpl_plugin.transactors.ApplyContext¶

Bases: pybind11_object

State information when applying a transaction.

The result from the preclaim processing.

property tx¶

The transaction.

Get an editable view into the current state of the ledger.

class xrpl_plugin.transactors.ApplyView¶

class xrpl_plugin.transactors.Fees¶

Bases: pybind11_object

Reflects the fee settings for a particular ledger. The fees are always the same for any transactions applied to a ledger. Changes to fees occur in between ledgers.

account_reserve(self: xrpl_plugin.transactors.Fees, arg0: int) → xrpl_plugin.basic_types.XRPAmount¶

Returns the account reserve given the owner count, in drops. The reserve is calculated as the reserve base plus the reserve increment times the number of increments.

property base¶

Reference tx cost (drops).

property increment¶

Reserve increment (drops).

property reserve¶

Reserve base (drops).

class xrpl_plugin.transactors.ReadView¶

Bases: pybind11_object

A view into a ledger. This interface provides read access to state and transaction items. There is no checkpointing or calculation of metadata.

exists(self: xrpl_plugin.transactors.ReadView, arg0: xrpl_plugin.keylets.Keylet) → bool¶

Determine if a state item exists.

property fees¶

The fees for the base ledger.

info(self: xrpl_plugin.transactors.ReadView) → xrpl_plugin.transactors.LedgerInfo¶

Returns information about the ledger.

open(self: xrpl_plugin.transactors.ReadView) → bool¶

Returns true if this reflects an open ledger.

parent_close_time(self: xrpl_plugin.transactors.ReadView) → xrpl_plugin.transactors.TimePoint¶

Returns the close time of the previous ledger.

property rules¶

The tx processing rules.

seq(self: xrpl_plugin.transactors.ReadView) → int¶

Returns the sequence number of the base ledger.

class xrpl_plugin.transactors.Rules¶

Bases: pybind11_object

Rules controlling protocol behavior, such as amendments.

Bases: pybind11_object

class xrpl_plugin.transactors.TxConsequences¶

Bases: pybind11_object

Class describing the consequences to the account of applying a transaction if the transaction consumes the maximum XRP allowed.

fee(self: xrpl_plugin.transactors.TxConsequences) → xrpl_plugin.basic_types.XRPAmount¶

The fee.

following_seq(self: xrpl_plugin.transactors.TxConsequences) → xrpl_plugin.basic_types.SeqProxy¶

The next sequence number.

is_blocker(self: xrpl_plugin.transactors.TxConsequences) → bool¶

Whether the TxConsequences is a blocker.

potential_spend(self: xrpl_plugin.transactors.TxConsequences) → xrpl_plugin.basic_types.XRPAmount¶

The potential spend.

seq_proxy(self: xrpl_plugin.transactors.TxConsequences) → xrpl_plugin.basic_types.SeqProxy¶

The sequence/ticket number.

sequences_consumed(self: xrpl_plugin.transactors.TxConsequences) → int¶

The number of sequences consumed.

class xrpl_plugin.transactors.TxConsequencesCategory¶

Bases: pybind11_object

Describes how the transaction affects subsequent transactions.

Performs early sanity checks on the account and fee fields
